methodology.title: Assessment Methodology
methodology.content: Our CCRA methodology combines climate hazard data, exposure levels, and vulnerability indicators to calculate risk scores. We use data from AdaptaBrasil and apply the C40 risk assessment framework.

calculations.title: Risk Score Calculations
calculations.content: Risk scores are calculated using the formula: Risk = Hazard × Exposure × Vulnerability. Each component is normalized on a 0-1 scale, with higher scores indicating greater risk.

features.title: Key Features
features.content:
• Data-driven risk assessment
• Future climate projections
• Qualitative assessment integration
• Sector-specific analysis
• Customizable reporting
